title: Automation puts IT-backed digital marketing units under strain
summary: As automation and GenAI accelerate creative output, IT-backed marketing units from TCS to Info Edge and Accenture are facing pressure on hiring, pricing and long-term viability.

title: Ad fatigue crisis hits Indian streaming services: Repetitive, low-cost ads drive viewers away
summary: Indian OTT platforms face viewer fatigue due to repetitive and lengthy ad breaks. Experts emphasize the need for improved ad experiences and transparency to regain user trust and prevent subscription cancellations amid growing customer frustration.

title: Govt clears two fund managers to roll out  ₹1 trillion deep-tech RDI scheme

title: Bank holiday today: Are banks open or closed on 9 December? Check inside
summary: Bank holiday today, 9 December: Bank holidays differ from region to region, depending on festivals or other special occasions like elections. Since there are Kerala local body polls on Tuesday, there is a bank holiday in Kerala.

title: The celebrity YouTube surge: Low costs, high reach, total control

title: Private credit booms in India as firms seek faster, flexible capital

title: Creative Churn: Indian advertising agencies dread layoffs as AI upends industry globally

title: Why small south Indian films are skipping Hindi theatrical releases

title: Bank Holidays next week: Banks to remain closed for 4 days between 8-14 December — See full list
summary: Bank holidays next week: Banks are typically closed on regional holidays, national holidays and the weekends. While only certain parts of India observe bank holidays during the regional holidays, all banks remain closed during national observances.

title: Government Stance on FDI Limits

This statement dashed market expectations, which were previously fueled by reports suggesting a potential increase to 49%.
